aboutUs.title: Trust earned over the years
aboutUs.missionDesc: - is not just a plumbing products store. It is the result of 15 years of hard work, dedication, and dreams.
aboutUs.missionDesc2: Our journey began in a small 10-square-meter shop. Our founder started as an ordinary salesperson but truly loved his work and served every customer with genuine care. It was this love, effort, and trust that transformed Casabella into a brand recognized across all of Uzbekistan.
aboutUs.visionDesc: now has 5 modern branches, and the total area of our stores has reached one thousand square meters. But this is only the beginning. We won't stop — every day, we strive to improve, innovate, and create the highest level of comfort for our customers.
aboutUs.visionDesc2: Every product you choose comes with a guarantee of quality and comfort. We always listen to your needs and strive to create perfection in every detail.
aboutUs.advantageDesc: One of {name}'s main advantages is the “sample” service, which allows you to see how the actual products you choose will look in your bathroom before installation. In addition, we are establishing partnerships with the highest-quality, exclusive, and premium brands that are not yet available in Uzbekistan
aboutUs.quote: “{name} means comfort, quality, taste and trust. We help you perfect every detail of your home.”
